desc.p: Up to 11 Alpha/Numeric characters.
none
The name of the file to load.
No Input Field
Defaults to bicplus.txt Note that Unix is case sensitive.
Reserved for Future Use
Rule 1
Rule 2
The type of action to be performed on the existing records in the DE.BIC table.
Mandatory Field with two options: Update or Overwrite
Update - Clear down only those records that have been automatically uploaded. Manually input records will remain.
Overwrite - Clear down all existing records and upload the current BIC directory as replacement.

N.B. In 'Update' mode, a BIC record still remaining on the DE.BIC table will not be overwritten if one is found on the current BIC database. It will be written to the Unauthorised file to await further action.
BIC+ directory file field delimitter character.
Can have the value of TAB or COMMA
Standard BIC export is TAB
COMMA is for possible future use
This is a multi valued field. Standard T24 alphanumeric field.
A maximum of 35 characters may be entered.
Location of the BIC+ directory file
Optional field
Default value will be the current working directory
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
